name: Switch Witch
description:
Switch Witch

Adventure through a mind-bending series of puzzles as you journey through the starry underground. Wisely make your decisions and time your shots to make it through this absolute labyrinth! Think in space and time - the 4th dimension.

What you see first may not always be the answer! Approach in different ways and maintain a flexible mind!

Controls

  • AD to Move
  • Space to Jump
  • WS to Aim up and Down
  • J to Shoot
  • M/Esc to Pause/Exit
  • R to Refresh Level

Audio Assets

  • Background Music: No Worries - by Pix
  • Sound Effects from David McKee (VIRiX Dreamcore) and HalftoneSFX pack LITE by VOiD1 Gaming

Content

  • 42+1 Levels
  • Around 1 hour 30 minutes - 2 hours playtime

Thank you for Playing!
